## Download stock historical from yahoo website
## Read CSV file
```{r}
AAPL <- read.csv("AAPL.csv")
head(AAPL)
```
## Using quantmod
```{r}
#install.packages("quantmod")

library(quantmod)
aapl <- getSymbols("AAPL", from = "2016-01-01", to = "2019-01-01", src="yahoo", auto.assign = F)
    ```
